Headline: #48 South Damen Temporary Southbound Reroute near Damen/47th
ShortDescription: SB 48 South Damen buses are temporarily rerouted via 47th, Ashland, 51st, and Damen due to construction near Damen/47th.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Southbound #48 South Damen buses are temporarily rerouted via 47th, Ashland, 51st, and Damen due to construction near Damen/47th.

Northbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #70 Division Temporary Eastbound Reroute near Division/Long
ShortDescription: Eastbound 70 Division buses are temporarily rerouted via Division, Central, Augusta, Laramie and Division: due to, street blockage near Division/Long.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Eastbound #70 Division buses are temporarily rerouted via Division, Central, Augusta, Laramie and Division: due to, street blockage near Division/Long.

Westbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.
